feed.title: Bitmagnet Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Bitmagnet: v0.7.8
entry.content:
This release includes several minor bug fixes.

What's Changed

  • Fix comma-separated Torznab categories by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/194
  • Rebuild webui by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/195
  • Fix Postgres call on CLI by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/196
  • Upgrade actions by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/198

New Contributors

  • @RealFascinated made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/193
  • @Ornias1993 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/188

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/compare/v0.7.7...v0.7.8

entry.title: New release for Bitmagnet: v0.7.10
entry.content:

  • Fix metrics endpoint by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/207

New Contributors

entry.title: New release for Bitmagnet: v0.7.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix Torznab content type criteria by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/209
  • fix duplicate word in index.md by @sweetbbak in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/208
  • Add external resources page by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/202
  • Upgrade GitHub Actions and fix Docker build by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/201
  • Fix actions: Use name and key for matrix by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/210

New Contributors

  • @sweetbbak made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/208

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/compare/v0.7.10...v0.7.12

entry.title: New release for Bitmagnet: v0.7.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix missing table for condition by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/215
  • Windows fixes: Implement Windows Socket interface and recover from socket read error by @mgdigital in https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/pull/203

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitmagnet-io/bitmagnet/compare/v0.7.12...v0.7.14
